Tues., Jan. 30: We will be previewing our work, announcing our new board members, presenting the Dave Judy Civil Rights Award, and recognizing folks in our ACLU community.
  

Dear ##first_name[Supporter]##,

Join us on Tuesday, January 30 for our annual membership meeting! We will be previewing our work priorities, announcing our new board members, presenting the Dave Judy Civil Rights Award, and recognizing folks in our ACLU community.

2018 Membership Meeting
Tuesday, January 30, 7-9 p.m.
Esther Simplot Performing Arts Academy
516 S 9th St.
Boise, ID 83702

All are welcome! This event is free and open to the public. Light appetizers will be served and we'll provide a no-host bar. You do not have to be a member of the ACLU to attend. RSVP today!

We look forward to seeing you there!

Sincerely,

Jeremy Woodson
Community Engagement Manager
ACLU of Idaho
